pullrequest.title: Model submission for X2 sensor configuration 2 by SSCI

content.raw:
This configuration is similar to the existing X2C6 with the addition of an upward point lidar. Your other \(merged\) X2 submission also has the added upward point lidar capability. Due to time constraints, this configuration will not be incorporated before the code freeze.   
  
Would you like to keep this PR open for consideration after Urban Circuit?
content.html:
This configuration is similar to the existing X2C6 with the addition of an upward point lidar. Your other (merged) X2 submission also has the added upward point lidar capability. Due to time constraints, this configuration will not be incorporated before the code freeze.

Would you like to keep this PR open for consideration after Urban Circuit?
